SourceString:
<H>"The City Guard, a shield against chaos!"</>

This <H>demo</> represents a very early version of our game. Consider it very, very work in progress.

Guards is designed to be <H>hard.</>  Enemies will not wait to attack you one at a time and even a simple mistake can prove <h>fatal for the whole squad</>. You have been warned!

This game is made by a <h>tiny team of 3 people</>. Any feedback and bugs you share with us help us make a <h>better game</>. You can find us on the <h>official discord</> accessible from the main menu.

<H>Welcome to the Guard!</>  Good luck!

Thankyou for playing our <H>demo!</>

If you enjoyed GUARDS! please <H>wishlist the game on Steam now!</> 

Your support means alot and  <h>every wishlist helps us continue making the games we love.</>

We look forward to sharing the <h>full game with you soon!</>

In the meantime, the HUB and first three missions are available to replay!

GOBBOZ = BAD

Attempt to arrest SOME

Remember! Arrested perps = $$$

Collateral damage is accepted 
but not condoned

Conflict resolution worksheets

Precinct softball  tryouts 19th
